name: Ants Are Awesome - LD48 (Deeper and Deeper)
name_original: Ants Are Awesome - LD48 (Deeper and Deeper)
description:
A relatively simple ant colony game. You do not directly control your ants but they will head towards the enemy when there is a viable route. Build your tunnels and make your way down to each enemy Queen.

Unfortunately I was overly ambitious and while the game had a huge amount of potential, trying a range of new things really slowed me down. Either way I’m proud of how some of the mechanics came out. Thanks for checking out my submission :)
